description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Biarritz, France. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Art Deco France Elegance on the Basque Coast with Atrium Bar & Terrace Restaurant
hotels.description: Grandeur, intricate design and the fresh breeze of the Basque Coast all await at the Regina Experimental Biarritz. Sitting atop a cliff face looking directly at the emblematic Biarritz lighthouse, this luxury hotel offers a glimpse into the glamour of early 20th century France, while seamlessly blending modern comforts. Indulge in a meal as the sun sets over the sea at Frenchie Biarritz, or perhaps discover the Art Deco jewels of the seaside town just a short stroll away.

hotels.title: France: Biarritz Boutique Beachside Art Deco Escape with Resort-Style Pool & Basque Restaurant
hotels.description: Unearth the hidden gems of the Basque Country with a stay at Hotel Le Garage Biarritz - a dreamy beachside haven, designed for lovers of Art Deco splendour. Spend your days in this coastal playground of the rich and famous exploring the legendary Grande Plage beach, the iconic Biarritz Lighthouse and the historic Sainte Eugenie Church before returning to the hotel's sun-soaked terrace, where you can enjoy Basque-inspired plates at the onsite Neo Bistro.

seo.title: Hotel a Biarritz - France Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Biarritz, France con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
